publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2988# Mr Lloyd Quinan: Autism Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 -That the Parliament acknowledges Autism Awareness Week 2002 and the forthcoming Autism Awareness Week 2003 by supporting both the Scottish Society for Autism and the National Autistic Society in Scotland in their efforts to promote and care for those affected by the condition and notes the incredible amount of work carried out by the very effective network of smaller support groups.
S1M-2988# Autism Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Michael Matheson*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2988# Autism Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Mr Keith Harding*, Linda Fabiani*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Christine Grahame*

S1M-2988# Mr Lloyd Quinan: Autism Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 -That the Parliament acknowledges Autism Awareness Week 2002 and the forthcoming Autism Awareness Week 2003 by supporting both the Scottish Society for Autism and the National Autistic Society in Scotland in their efforts to promote and care for those affected by the condition and notes the incredible amount of work carried out by the very effective network of smaller support groups. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Ms Sandra White, Mr Keith Harding, Linda Fabiani, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Christine Grahame, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2988# Autism Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Brian Adam*
S1M-2988# Autism Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Kay Ullrich*, Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-2988# Autism Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Fergus Ewing*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-2988# Autism Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2988# Autism Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Alex Neil*
S1M-2988# Autism Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-2988# Autism Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2988# Autism Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
S1M-2988# Autism Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Tricia Marwick*
